My PM Bookshelf

Books and Blogs on Product Management and Leadership.

The Bookshelf

I'm reading quite a few books; here is the organized list of them.

I've tried to organized them in a way to create a path: closer to the center are essentials, and the further they are â€“ the better they become when you have your very own experience.

  • Essentials are good for junior PMs, who are building features;
  • The ones in between are for mid-level PMs, who are building products;
  • At last, the furthest are for seniors, whos building organizations and systems.
